modality: Worse at night, after walking or standing; better lying down
notes: Equisetum: Urging and fullness even after urination

modality: Worse during and after urination; worse from spicy food
notes: Cantharis: Extreme burning before, during, and after

modality: Worse at night, while sneezing, coughing or walking
notes: Causticum: Incontinence during laughter or exertion

rubric: Urine – retention – cannot pass despite urging
modality: Worse after surgery, childbirth or emotional shock
notes: Belladonna: Sensation of full bladder with no flow

modality: Worse from movement, touch or standing
notes: Cantharis: Urging with drop-by-drop urination

modality: Worse on exertion or after trauma
notes: Terebinth: Smoky, coffee-ground appearance

modality: Worse in first sleep; worse from cold; worse during dreams
notes: Causticum: Involuntary urine in early night sleep

modality: Pain worse at end of urination; better standing
notes: Sarsaparilla: Must stand to urinate, pain after flow ends

modality: Worse after physical exertion or meat consumption
notes: Benzoic acid: Extremely offensive, horse-like smell

modality: Worse after meals, exposure to cold
notes: Lycopodium: Red sand or brick-dust sediment

rubric: Urination – suppressed – no desire or flow
modality: Worse after surgical shock, trauma, or fear
notes: Opium: No urge even though bladder is full; painless retention

modality: Worse from heat, after lying down, or suppressed emotions
notes: Apis: Urine scanty, dark; patient thirstless and edematous

modality: Worse in nephrotic or post-scarlatinal conditions
notes: Arsenicum: Pale, albuminous urine with burning and prostration

modality: Worse after high protein intake; worse after exertion
notes: Phosphorus: Urine foamy, rich in phosphates; tendency to diabetes

modality: Worse during prostate enlargement or bladder spasm
notes: Clematis: Urine flows and stops suddenly, must strain again

modality: Worse at night; worse from cold or sitting long hours
notes: Sabal: Dribbling, incomplete urination with enlarged prostate

modality: Worse during exertion; worse from fasting or stress
notes: Ph-acid: Polyuria with debility and burning in diabetics

modality: Worse at night; worse from sweets or starches
notes: Phosphorus: High thirst, frequent pale urine, sugar in urine

modality: Worse after rich food, sedentary life
notes: Lycopodium: Red sandy deposit, child screams before urinating

modality: Worse from cold exposure; worse sitting
notes: Equisetum: Constant desire, little passed, with pain before

modality: Worse during urination; worse after coition or exposure to cold
notes: Cannabis sativa: Burning, cutting pain in urethra; frequent urging

modality: Worse after exposure to cold or suppression of urine
notes: Cantharis: Violent burning with constant, fruitless urging

modality: Worse before, during, and after urination
notes: Sarsaparilla: Pain most severe at end of urination

rubric: Renal colic – pain during stone passage
modality: Worse from motion, better bending forward or lying curled up
notes: Berberis: Radiating pain from kidney to bladder and thighs

rubric: Urination – painful – extending to thighs or back
modality: Worse after walking or pressure
notes: Pareira: Must kneel and strain to urinate, pain radiates to thighs

modality: Worse during urination; worse from trauma or overexertion
notes: Hamamelis: Dark blood in urine, painless but profuse

modality: Worse during cough, laughter, or excitement
notes: Causticum: Involuntary urination from slightest excitement or exertion

modality: Worse from inactivity, anesthesia or trauma
notes: Belladonna: Sensation of fullness but no ability to urinate

modality: Worse after rich food, better from warm drinks
notes: Lycopodium: Red sand sediment in diaper or urine pot

rubric: Urination – strain – must press or bend to pass
modality: Worse sitting; better kneeling forward with pressure
notes: Pareira: Must get on knees and press hard to void urine

modality: Worse at night or during teething
notes: Lycopodium: Red sand in diaper; child screams before urination

rubric: Urine – stains diaper – reddish or orange
modality: Worse after rich food or sweets
notes: Lycopodium: Brick-dust sediment in urine; classic child rubric

modality: Worse in septic conditions or advanced kidney damage
notes: Terebinth: Coffee-ground appearance with albumin

modality: Worse in liver disorders or biliary obstruction
notes: Chelidonium: Urine green, bitter taste in mouth, liver pain

modality: Worse from exhaustion, grief, or brain fag
notes: Ph-acid: Pale, profuse urine with debility and apathy

rubric: Incontinence – elderly – during sleep or movement
modality: Worse at night, cold air, or unconsciousness
notes: Baryta carb: Weak bladder, senile dribbling

modality: Worse from prostate issues or anxiety
notes: Conium: Difficulty initiating flow; interrupted stream

rubric: Bladder pain – with anxiety or nervousness
modality: Worse after emotional suppression or humiliation
notes: Staphysagria: Post-coital bladder discomfort; sensitive people

rubric: Post-catheter – pain or inability to void
modality: Worse after instrumentation or surgery
notes: Arnica: Trauma-induced urinary difficulty with soreness

rubric: Urination – coldness or chills during flow
modality: Worse at night or after lying down
notes: Silicea: Chilliness felt down spine while urinating

modality: Worse after birth trauma or exposure to cold
notes: Aconite: Sudden suppression after fright or chill; restless infant

modality: Worse after prolonged labor or catheter use
notes: Causticum: Weak bladder tone post-delivery, inability to void

modality: Worse in first trimester; worse standing or walking
notes: Sepia: Urine escapes with cough, sneeze, or laugh; pelvic heaviness

modality: Worse in high fevers with dry skin; dehydration
notes: Apis: Dry skin, thirstless, scanty urine in fever

modality: Worse in late-stage TB or emaciation
notes: Phosphorus: Pale, albuminous urine in advanced phthisis

rubric: Urine – retention – after trauma or fracture
modality: Worse from shock, injury to spine or pelvis
notes: Opium: No desire or sensation to urinate after shock

rubric: Urine – black – in hemorrhagic fevers or cancer
modality: Worse with internal bleeding, sepsis, or malignancy
notes: Crotalus: Hemorrhagic black urine in toxic or septic states

modality: Worse in uterine or bladder cancer; later stages
notes: Nit-acid: Corrosive odor, putrid urine in malignancy

modality: Worse walking, coughing, laughing
notes: Pulsatilla: Involuntary loss while walking or after emotions

modality: Worse in sensitive skin, in infants or aged
notes: Nitric acid: Excoriation around genitals due to acrid urine

rubric: Urine – involuntary – from paralysis or stroke
modality: Worse in elderly, post-hemiplegia or post-surgical cases
notes: Opium: No urge; passive dribbling with complete unconsciousness

rubric: Urination – fear or anxiety before urinating
modality: Worse in public places, exams, or emotional tension
notes: Arg-nit: Nervous bladder, frequent urge before public events

modality: Worse at night or in chilly climates
notes: Silicea: Chilliness down the spine during urination

modality: Worse in chronic catarrhal or gonorrheal states
notes: Kali-bi: Tenacious mucus in urine; burning pain

modality: Worse after protein-rich diet; metabolic states
notes: Benzoic acid: Highly offensive, pungent urine with sediment

rubric: Urination – interrupted – must wait for flow to resume
modality: Worse in elderly or with prostate enlargement
notes: Clematis: Flow stops and starts again; incomplete emptying

rubric: Urination – relieved by kneeling or pressing abdomen
modality: Worse standing; better leaning forward or kneeling
notes: Pareira: Must get on all fours to pass urine

rubric: Urination – cutting pain in urethra during flow
modality: Worse at end of urination; worse after coition
notes: Cantharis: Intense pain with drop-by-drop urination

rubric: Urination – clear, profuse – with great debility
modality: Worse from overwork, grief, or loss of fluids
notes: Ph-acid: Frequent, colorless urine with mental indifference

modality: Worse after urination; worse from cold drinks
notes: Sarsaparilla: Child cries when last drops pass due to pain at meatus

modality: Worse at night, after walking or standing; better lying down
notes: Equisetum: Urging and fullness even after urination

modality: Worse with internal bleeding, sepsis, or malignancy

notes: Pulsatilla: Involuntary loss while walking or after emotions

modality: Worse in sensitive skin, in infants or aged
notes: Nitric acid: Excoriation around genitals due to acrid urine

rubric: Urination – painful – in infants (cries while urinating)
modality: Worse before and during urination
notes: Sarsaparilla: Severe pain at end of urination; child cries out

modality: Better standing; worse sitting or lying down
notes: Sarsaparilla: Can only pass urine when standing erect

rubric: Urine – passed drop by drop – with pain
modality: Worse with tenesmus; worse after coition or walking
notes: Cantharis: Painful drop-by-drop urination with intense burning

modality: Worse at night or after rich food
notes: Benzoic acid: Offensive urine, staining diaper brown or yellow

modality: Worse before public speaking, travel, anxiety
notes: Arg-nit: Frequent urging before exams, public events

rubric: Urination – involuntary – during laughter or cough
modality: Worse during exertion, laughter, pregnancy
notes: Sepia: Pelvic floor weakness, stress incontinence

modality: Worse during menstruation or hormonal changes
notes: Pulsatilla: Urine dark, frequent, painful during periods

rubric: Urination – pain – before, during, and after
modality: Worse from movement or emotional stress
notes: Cantharis: Pain with burning at all stages of urination

rubric: Urination – dribbling – in boys (phimosis or stricture)
modality: Worse after foreskin retraction or irritation
notes: Petroselinum: Dribbling, burning, itching of glans and urethra

rubric: Urine – stains linen – yellow or brown
modality: Worse after sweets, meats, or rich food
notes: Benzoic acid: Highly staining, pungent, brownish urine

rubric: Urine – passed in sleep without awareness
modality: Worse first sleep, in dreams, or from fear
notes: Causticum: Enuresis with vivid dreams or laughter

rubric: Urine – bloody – with burning and tenesmus
modality: Worse during urination; worse from movement
notes: Cantharis: Raw burning pain with bloody, scanty urine

rubric: Urine – sediment – pink or red, sand-like
modality: Worse sedentary lifestyle; better motion
notes: Lycopodium: Brick-dust sediment in urine or diaper

modality: Worse from walking or riding
notes: Berberis: Pain extending from kidneys to bladder

rubric: Urine – drops on sneezing or laughing
modality: Worse in women after childbirth or menopause
notes: Sepia: Pelvic organ weakness, prolapse, stress incontinence

modality: Worse after meat or eggs; worse chronic kidney
notes: Benzoic acid: Strong-smelling, foul, pungent urine

modality: Worse during climacteric, heat flushes, anxiety
notes: Kreosotum: Corrosive bleeding with burning in bladder

modality: Worse after suppressed emotions or sexual excess
notes: Staphysagria: Pain, burning, shame after intercourse

modality: Worse prostate enlargement or nervous weakness
notes: Conium: Slow, hesitant flow with weak bladder tone

modality: Worse with cold exposure or excitement
notes: Petroselinum: Sudden uncontrollable urge, especially in children

rubric: Urine – hot – feels burning hot when passed
modality: Worse during urination; worse inflammation or infection
notes: Cantharis: Scalding urine with violent burning and tenesmus

modality: Worse night, after lying down, or chilliness
notes: Silicea: Cold sensation in bladder or spine during micturition

modality: Worse with enlarged prostate or sitting too long
notes: Sabal: Weak stream, dribbling, fullness with urge

modality: Worse during exertion, stress, or pelvic weakness
notes: Causticum: Weak sphincter; urine leaks while walking

rubric: Urination – slow – delayed start, weak stream
modality: Worse with shyness, prostate issues
notes: Clematis: Urination starts then stops; frequent interruptions

modality: Better in warm water or after washing
notes: Staphysagria: Sensitive bladder; relief from warmth

modality: Worse after suppressed anger, insult, or grief
notes: Staphysagria: Cystitis after sexual trauma or emotional hurt

rubric: Urine – passed in small quantities – frequent
modality: Worse after cold exposure or exertion
notes: Equisetum: Urging with scanty discharge

modality: Worse from high protein diet, chronic kidney disease
notes: Phosphorus: Foamy urine; tendency to nephritis or diabetes

modality: Worse in advanced infections or hemorrhagic states
notes: Terebinth: Dark smoky urine with albumin and hematuria

modality: Worse prostate enlargement or bladder atony
notes: Thuja: Dribbling after voiding, forked stream

rubric: Urination – difficult – with urging but no flow
modality: Worse after anger, cold, or intoxication
notes: Nux-v: Constant urging; scanty painful urine

rubric: Urine – frothy and pale – early diabetes
modality: Worse fasting; worse after sweets
notes: Ph-acid: Weakness with profuse, pale, frothy urine

modality: Better pressure on bladder; better abdomen-down
notes: Berberis: Kidney pain and urging better by pressure or lying prone

modality: Worse with anxiety, prostate problems
notes: Clematis: Sudden interruption of urine stream

rubric: Urination – burning in urethra without flow
modality: Worse after coition or emotion; better warm bathing
notes: Staphysagria: Urethral pain from suppressed anger or shame

modality: Worse in fatty liver, malabsorption or diabetes
notes: Phosphorus: Greasy, fatty film in diabetic urine

rubric: Urine – contains mucus – cloudy or stringy
modality: Worse in chronic cystitis or gonorrhea history
notes: Kali bich: Thick ropy mucus in urine; chronic infection

modality: Worse with cold or laughing; bladder oversensitivity
notes: Petroselinum: Must run; spasmodic urgency, especially in children

rubric: Urine – retained – better after passing gas
modality: Better after flatulence or pressure on bladder
notes: Lycopodium: Flatulence presses on bladder causing retention

modality: Worse in females; worse during urination
notes: Murex: Sexual excitement after micturition; uterine congestion

rubric: Urination – with cough – urine spurts involuntarily
modality: Worse on laughing, sneezing, coughing
notes: Causticum: Stress incontinence from pelvic muscle weakness

modality: Worse after passing urine, especially at night
notes: Gelsemium: Chills run down back post-micturition

modality: During or after seizure; unconsciousness
notes: Bufo: Incontinence during convulsion with loss of control

modality: Worse in elderly or weak individuals
notes: Digitalis: Collapse with pulse weakness during urination

modality: Worse in gout, old rheumatics
notes: Benzoic acid: Very offensive, pungent horse-urine smell

rubric: Urine – viscid, stringy – difficult to clean
modality: Worse in chronic inflammation of urinary tract
notes: Kali bich: Ropy, tenacious mucus in urine

modality: Worse in septicemia or hepatic diseases
notes: Greenish urine seen in severe liver pathology or infections

rubric: Urine – leaves oily ring in vessel
modality: Worse in diabetes, fatty degeneration
notes: Phosphorus: Milky, fatty urine with floating film

rubric: Urination – violent urging but passes only a few drops
modality: Worse after coition, sitting, cold exposure
notes: Cantharis: Urging intense, but urine scanty, with raw burning

rubric: Polyuria – excessive urination – especially at night (nocturnal)
modality: Worse at night, after sugar intake, during diabetes
notes: Phos-acid: Profuse, pale, exhausting urination in diabetes or weakness

rubric: Oliguria – scanty urination – with edema or nephritis
modality: Worse in acute glomerulonephritis, heart failure, cold
notes: Digitalis: Renal suppression with heart symptoms and dropsy

modality: Worse with enlarged prostate, elderly, or post-void
notes: Thuja: Forked stream, dribbling with incomplete sensation

rubric: Incontinence – stress – from laughing, coughing, sneezing
modality: Worse in pelvic weakness, post-childbirth, elderly
notes: Sepia: Leaks with exertion, worse during pregnancy or prolapse

rubric: Incontinence – urge – sudden uncontrollable desire to urinate
modality: Worse during excitement, children, bladder irritability
notes: Petroselinum: Sudden urgent desire; runs to toilet but passes little

rubric: Incontinence – reflex – during sleep or unconscious state
modality: Worse first sleep, seizures, head trauma, dreams
notes: Causticum: Wetting without awareness; with dreams or laughter

rubric: Incontinence – overflow – bladder full but dribbling
modality: Worse in elderly, enlarged prostate, neurogenic bladder
notes: Baryta carb: Retention with overflow in senile or dull patients

rubric: Retention – cannot urinate – with full bladder sensation
modality: Worse after surgery, cold, childbirth, anesthesia
notes: Nux-v: Ineffectual urge; small drops passed painfully

modality: Better standing erect; worse sitting or lying
notes: Sarsaparilla: Child screams until lifted to urinate standing

rubric: Enuresis – bedwetting – involuntary urination in sleep
modality: Worse first sleep, anxiety, suppression of emotions
notes: Kreosotum: Involuntary discharge while dreaming of urinating

modality: Worse after instrumental delivery, fear, surgical insult
notes: Staphysagria: Emotional shock or surgical trauma leads to inability to void

rubric: Urine – passed unconsciously during deep sleep
modality: Worse in early night, with dreams or complete unconsciousness
notes: Kreosotum: Dreams of urination followed by wetting

rubric: Urination – paralytic – cannot feel urge or passage
modality: After trauma, stroke, spinal injury, anesthesia
notes: Opium: Bladder full, no urge, retention from nervous inactivity

rubric: Urination – intermittent – stream stops and starts
modality: Worse with prostate enlargement, anxiety, cold
notes: Clematis: Flow stops mid-stream and resumes after effort

rubric: Urine – passed involuntarily after fright or excitement
modality: After emotional shock, grief, exam fear
notes: Gelsemium: Paralysis of bladder under emotional strain

rubric: Urination – cannot pass when someone is nearby (shy bladder)
modality: Worse public places, exams, suppressed emotions
notes: Lycopodium: Cannot urinate in presence of others

modality: Post-op retention, catheter trauma
notes: Opium: Bladder becomes paralyzed after surgical trauma

rubric: Urine – passed involuntarily during seizure or spasm
modality: During convulsions, epilepsy, night terrors
notes: Bufo: Urination involuntary during grand mal seizures

rubric: Urine – dribbles constantly – no sensation of fullness
modality: Post-injury, stroke, coma; no bladder control
notes: Causticum: Paralysis of sphincter; dribbling without control

modality: Worse after urethral instrumentation, insult
notes: Staphysagria: Urethral burning and trauma post-instrumentation

modality: Worse during last trimester, motion, coughing
notes: Sepia: Pelvic floor weakness; leaks on walking or standing

modality: Worse during flow; better after menses ends
notes: Causticum: Bladder dysfunction worse with uterine congestion

rubric: Urination – absent or extremely painful at menopause
modality: Worse with flushes, heat, and pelvic stasis
notes: Sepia: Genito-urinary stasis with irritability and prolapse

modality: Worse during exertion, weakness of sphincter
notes: Causticum: Paralytic sphincter with stress leakage

rubric: Bladder – pain after passing urine – deep ache
modality: Worse after voiding; better pressure or heat
notes: Equisetum: Deep dull pain remains after urination

modality: Worse from emotional insult, infection
notes: Cantharis: Violent burning spasms interrupt flow

rubric: Urine – involuntary in elderly with memory loss
modality: Worse with senility, dementia, stroke
notes: Baryta carb: Incontinence with mental dullness, prostate weakness

rubric: Urination – only when sound of water is heard
modality: Stimulated by hearing running water
notes: Gelsemium: Inertia of bladder relieved by water stimulus

rubric: Urine – escapes while sleeping in sitting position
modality: Worse dozing off in chair or semi-reclined sleep
notes: Hyoscyamus: Incontinence with unconsciousness or spasm

rubric: Bladder – fullness – no urge – can't pass urine
modality: Worse post-surgery, neurogenic bladder, trauma
notes: Opium: Bladder overdistended but no desire to urinate

rubric: Retention of urine – from spinal injury or disc compression
modality: Worse after trauma, fall, lumbar disc herniation
notes: Hypericum: Nerve injury bladder retention with pain radiating along spine

rubric: Urination – suppressed – due to hysteria or emotional shock
modality: Worse after grief, shock, humiliation
notes: Ignatia: Emotional suppression causes retention without organic cause

modality: Worse in advanced stages, after radiation, cachexia
notes: Arsenicum: Restlessness, anxiety, burning urine, tumor pressure

rubric: Urine – passed drop by drop with intense straining
modality: Worse after chill, alcohol, anger
notes: Nux vomica: Ineffectual urge; rectal and bladder tenesmus

rubric: Urination – paralyzed bladder after catheter removal
modality: Worse after long catheterization or trauma
notes: Opium: Atonic bladder; no urge or passage

rubric: Urine – expelled only with abdominal straining
modality: Worse in elderly, enlarged prostate, constipation
notes: Conium: No bladder contraction; straining needed to void

rubric: Incontinence – when emotionally overwhelmed or laughing excessively
modality: Worse with uncontrolled emotion or surprise
notes: Hyoscyamus: Laughs till urine passes; emotional outbursts

rubric: Urination – black or tar-colored – with advanced disease
modality: Worse in sepsis, advanced liver or bladder malignancy
notes: Crotalus: Black urine with hemorrhagic diathesis

modality: Worse in children, urethral spasm
notes: Sarsaparilla: Stream shoots with force, often painful

rubric: Urination – requires intense concentration to initiate
modality: Worse when watched, anxious, in strange places
notes: Silicea: Bashful bladder; requires solitude and focus

rubric: Burning pain – before, during, and after urination
modality: Worse from cold drinks, during inflammation; better warm applications
notes: Cantharis: Intolerable burning with constant urge

modality: Worse with full bladder, motion; better lying still
notes: Equisetum: Cutting sensation with fullness and ineffectual urging

rubric: Smarting sensation – in urethra after urination
modality: Worse after passing urine, especially in males
notes: Petroselinum: Sensation as if drop remains, causing tingling/smarting

rubric: Burning at bladder neck or deep inside
modality: Worse at end of urination or after long retention
notes: Sarsaparilla: Burning felt deep with pain at close of urination

rubric: Sensation – drop remaining in urethra after urination
modality: Worse in men, after prostatic issues, chronic urethritis
notes: Thuja: Constant sensation as if a drop of urine remains

modality: Worse while urinating, better lying flat
notes: Nitric acid: Sharp stitching during passage of urine

rubric: Pain in bladder – extending to thighs or genitals
modality: Worse from straining, better sitting with knees apart
notes: Pareira: Must kneel and strain with pain radiating to thighs

rubric: Burning in urethra – when not urinating
modality: Worse between urinations, better urinating
notes: Sulphur: Burning independent of urination, as if urine is acid

rubric: Sensation – bladder always full, even after urinating
modality: Worse from motion, better lying flat
notes: Equisetum: Constant fullness with little output; no relief after voiding

rubric: Sensation – urine flows drop by drop with burning
modality: Worse in cystitis, heat exposure, coition
notes: Cantharis: Drop-by-drop passage with intolerable burning

rubric: Straining – intense effort with little urine passed
modality: Worse after anger, cold, alcohol; better heat
notes: Nux vomica: Ineffectual urging with frequent straining and rectal tenesmus

modality: Worse on initiating flow; better continuous stream
notes: Equisetum: Sharp or dull pain starting urination, relieved later

modality: Worse after voiding; burning or tearing at end
notes: Sarsaparilla: Severe pain at termination of urination, especially in children

rubric: Cramps – in bladder before or during urination
modality: Worse from chill, before menses, touch
notes: Belladonna: Spasmodic cramps, sensitive to pressure

rubric: Pressing pain – in bladder as from a weight
modality: Worse standing or walking; better lying on back
notes: Sepia: Bearing down pain with prolapse or cystocele

rubric: Burning in bladder – without desire to urinate
modality: Worse at night or after drinking cold water
notes: Arsenicum: Burning as from hot coals even without urge

rubric: Coldness – in bladder or urethra during urination
modality: Worse cold weather, night, uncovering feet
notes: Camphora: Chill runs down spine with icy cold urine

rubric: Burning in urethra – like hot wires inside
modality: Worse from pressure, coition, coffee
notes: Nitric acid: Raw burning with mucopurulent discharge

rubric: Sensation – urine passes over sore spot
modality: Worse pressure, after urination
notes: Berberis: Raw burning at one point in urethra

modality: Worse touch, post-micturition
notes: Petroselinum: Crawling and tickling sensation in urethra

modality: Worse from touch, evening, after coition
notes: Petroselinum: Intense itching after urination, with crawling sensation

modality: Worse sitting, pressure on prostate, long sitting
notes: Berberis: Burning from bladder through perineum and urethra

rubric: Sudden urging – as if bladder would burst
modality: Worse on sight/sound of water, cold air, emotion
notes: Equisetum: Bladder feels full, urgent but passes little

rubric: Fluttering or vibrating sensation in bladder
modality: Worse at rest, suppressed emotion, sexual frustration
notes: Sepia: Vibration or fluttering from uterus/bladder region

rubric: Sensation – as if bladder would fall out
modality: Worse standing, better crossing legs or sitting
notes: Sepia: Prolapse sensation with dragging down feeling

rubric: Electric-like shocks – from bladder to urethra
modality: Worse during urination, after trauma or injury
notes: Plumbum: Nerve involvement causing shooting pains

rubric: Heaviness in bladder – like stone or weight
modality: Worse walking, better lying on back
notes: Sepia: Bearing-down sensation like a stone inside bladder

rubric: Sensation – as if something is alive in bladder
modality: Worse when sitting alone, silent room
notes: Thuja: Sensation of living creature in pelvic organs

rubric: Burning in urethra – without passing urine
modality: Worse from sitting, after coition, at night
notes: Sulphur: Burning as if urine were hot acid, even between urination

rubric: Pulling pain – from bladder to thighs or back
modality: Worse with full bladder, better heat
notes: Berberis: Dragging/stretching pain as if bladder is pulled backward

rubric: Gnawing pain – in bladder after urination
modality: Worse after urinating; better pressure or warm bath
notes: Nitric acid: Persistent gnawing pain suggesting ulceration

modality: Worse from motion, better rest; with bloody urine
notes: Merc sol: Pain as if raw and ulcerated, aggravated by cold

rubric: Sensation – as if urine is hot acid
modality: Worse night, alcohol, sugar intake
notes: Sulphur: Burning so intense it feels corrosive

rubric: Sticking pain – in bladder extending to urethra
modality: Worse walking or pressure on bladder
notes: Berberis: Sharp, pricking pain with spasm and tenesmus

rubric: Sensation – of stream of cold water passing through urethra
modality: Worse during urination, cold air, exposure
notes: Camphora: Peculiar icy sensation down urethra while urinating

rubric: Pain – after urination lasting for hours
modality: Worse after voiding, sitting; better lying down
notes: Equisetum: Dull aching or burning lingering after urination

rubric: Pain – from bladder to navel or pubic bone
modality: Worse motion, better pressure
notes: Berberis: Radiating pain from bladder upward or forward

rubric: Sensation – bladder is swollen or balloon-like
modality: Worse not urinating; better after partial voiding
notes: Digitalis: Retention with feeling of heavy, distended bladder

modality: Worse 2nd/3rd trimester, motion, intercourse
notes: Sepia: Irritative burning due to pressure from uterus

rubric: Sensation – urine cuts through urethra like razor
modality: Worse at end of urination, after exertion
notes: Nitric acid: Severe stinging as if razor blade passed

modality: Worse in sepsis, advanced jaundice, kidney failure
notes: Crotalus: Hemorrhagic urine in toxic fevers or liver failure

modality: Worse from sedentary lifestyle, seminal loss, grief
notes: Phos-ac: Phosphaturia, milky urine in debilitated states

modality: Worse during cystitis, trauma, heat
notes: Cantharis: Burning urine with hematuria and violent tenesmus

modality: Worse in liver dysfunction, infections
notes: Lycopodium: Greenish, offensive urine in hepatic conditions

modality: Worse after exhaustion, diabetes, nervous breakdown
notes: Phos-ac: Colorless, profuse urine in brain-fag, grief states

modality: Worse in gout, protein metabolism issues
notes: Benzoic acid: Intolerably strong-smelling urine, especially in gout

modality: Worse with leucorrhea, sexual infections, pelvic pathology
notes: Sepia: Fishy, ammoniacal odor linked with pelvic organ weakness

modality: Worse in diabetes mellitus, emaciated children
notes: Phos-ac: Sweet odor in pale, profuse urine of diabetics

modality: Worse in lithiasis, children, gout
notes: Lycopodium: Red sand sediment in children with weak digestion

rubric: Urine – thick, mucous or purulent sediment
modality: Worse in chronic infection, prostatitis, gonorrhea
notes: Terebinth: Mucous + blood; smell of violets

rubric: Urine – white flakes or phosphatic sediment
modality: Worse from mental strain, debility, after menses
notes: Phos-ac: Debilitated urine with white sediment, painless

modality: Worse in gout, meat diet, liver complaints
notes: Benzoic acid: Urine smells strong and foul; gouty diathesis

modality: Worse standing long, cystitis, in children
notes: Nitric acid: Strong ammonia smell with dark, staining urine

rubric: Urine – like cat’s urine or animal smell
modality: Worse during pregnancy, menopause, early morning
notes: Sepia: Urine has feline odor; strong enough to fill the room

modality: Worse in diabetes mellitus
notes: Phos-ac: Weak, emaciated, urine smells fruity in diabetics

modality: Worse in septicemia, typhoid, renal failure
notes: Crotalus: Urine black, foul, putrid in septic states

modality: Worse in elderly men, enlarged prostate, cold air
notes: Chimaphila: Needs to strain, weak stream, feels he must kneel to urinate

rubric: Urine stream – interrupted, stops and starts
modality: Worse with prostate issues, after coition, cold
notes: Clematis: Intermittent stream, must wait or strain to continue

rubric: Urine stream – split stream or double stream
modality: Worse after coition, urethral stricture, urethritis
notes: Thuja: Forked or scattered urine stream, often in urethral wart cases

rubric: Urine stream – jerking or spasmodic flow
modality: Worse from irritation, nervousness
notes: Staphysagria: Nervous bladder, spasmodic stream especially after surgery

rubric: Urine stream – delayed start or hesitation
modality: Worse morning, anxiety, prostate issues
notes: Conium: Must wait long time before flow starts, especially in elderly

rubric: Pain – at neck of bladder during urination
modality: Worse at end of urination, deep seated inflammation
notes: Pareira: Pain so intense, must kneel and strain

rubric: Pain – from bladder radiating to thighs
modality: Worse during motion or full bladder
notes: Berberis: Pulling pain to thighs or kidneys during urination

modality: Worse touch, night, excitement
notes: Petroselinum: Tingling or crawling pain after urination

rubric: Pain – in glans penis during urination
modality: Worse with stricture, gonorrheal history
notes: Cannabis: Sharp cutting pain felt at tip of penis while urinating

rubric: Pain – in perineum during or after urination
modality: Worse after sitting long, prostatitis
notes: Sabal: Dull pain in perineum radiating to bladder

rubric: Pain – in urethra extending to labia or vagina during urination
modality: Worse in females, during menses, pregnancy
notes: Sepia: Smarting pain radiating to vulva in cystitis or vaginitis

rubric: Pain – from kidney to bladder during urination
modality: Worse during passage of stones, before urination
notes: Berberis: Cutting pain in ureteral path; renal colic with tenesmus

rubric: Pain – in urethra felt only at end of urination
modality: Worse in lithiasis, infections; better after warm application
notes: Sarsaparilla: Intense burning or stabbing pain post-flow

rubric: Pain – from bladder to navel (hypogastrium) during urination
modality: Worse on straining, inflamed bladder, children
notes: Belladonna: Shooting pain from bladder upward during urination

rubric: Pain – in meatus (external urethra) with stinging
modality: Worse touch, friction, after urination
notes: Petroselinum: Crawling, stinging sensation at meatus; gonorrhea link

rubric: Pain – in bladder with feeling as if a ball were moving inside
modality: Worse sitting, walking, during urination
notes: Sepia: Sensation of a ball in bladder radiating to vagina; common in prolapse cases

rubric: Pain – at root of penis during urination
modality: Worse after sexual excess, urethral inflammation
notes: Staphysagria: Deep soreness at root with suppressed anger or sexual suppression

rubric: Pain – from bladder down to thighs or genitals
modality: Worse during urination, sitting, full bladder
notes: Lilium: Dragging pain from bladder downward into pelvis or thighs

rubric: Pain – radiating to sacrum or back during urination
modality: Worse motion, morning, after chilling
notes: Equisetum: Backache with urination, not relieved even after passing urine

modality: Worse in small girls, during micturition, genital irritation
notes: Kreosotum: Violent itching and pain in clitoris with acrid leucorrhea and urine
